name: Doric's Quest
Start point: Doric, in his house north of Falador.
Description: Doric the dwarf is happy to let you use his anvils, but first he would like you to run an errand for him.

Items required: Any Pickaxe (can be obtained during the quest)

substeps: Speak to Doric in his house north of Falador.
He will ask you to bring him 6 Clay, 4 Copper ore, and 2 Iron ore.
Ensure you have a pickaxe. If not, one can be found on a table in a building in Barbarian Village.
Enter the Dwarven Mine, located just north-east of Doric's house.
Mine 4 Copper ore from the copper rocks.
Mine 2 Iron ore from the iron rocks.
Mine 6 Clay from the clay rocks (further south within the mine).
Return to Doric with the 6 Clay, 4 Copper ore, and 2 Iron ore.
Talk to him to give him the items and complete the quest.
